properties.notes: Original Belgrano Station Replaced by Belgrano II in 1979.

Casey Station was officially opened in 1969 but the original buildings were abandoned (and later removed) in the 1980's.  A major rebuilding program was conducted with the new buildings at Casey coming on line in 1988.
Joint-use memorandum signed in 2005 between Australia and Romania.
A fire destoyed the buildings in February 2012

properties.cga_name_o: St. Kliment Ohridski Base (BGR); Ohridiski Station (USA)
Capitan Arturo Prat (RUS); Arturo Prat Station (USA)
properties.notes: The Chilean Permanent Information on the Antarctic Treaty file states that this station is inactive, but facilities are operational.
The Chilean Permanent Information on the Antarctic Treaty file states that this station is inactive.
Operated jointly by Italy and France
Concordia Station opened Dec 1997 for summer-only operation. Opened for year-round operation Feb 2005.
GARS is operated as an annex station to the General Bernardo O'Higgins Station (Chile).
Neumeyer II was established in 1992 and was closed on 28 February 2009. It was replaced by Neumeyer III in 2009.

properties.cga_name_o: Stazione Mario Zucchelli (ITA); Mario Zucchelli Station (USA)

properties.notes: Troll Station opened Feb 1990 for summer-only operation. Opened for year-round operation Feb 2005.
Original SANAE Station opened 1962. SANAE IV opened 1997 at a new location, 200km South of SANAE I to III.

properties.notes: The new elevated Amundsen-Scott South Pole Station was dedicated in January 2008.
